results.definition: the act of catching an object with the hands
examples: he made a grab for the ball before it landed

results.definition: take hold of so as to seize or restrain or stop the motion of
capture the attention or imagination of
get hold of or seize quickly and easily
a mechanical device for gripping an object
make a grasping or snatching motion with the hand
examples: The passenger grabbed for the oxygen mask
She grabbed the child's hand and ran out of the room
